entry_form.name: AS_GSS_FM_addOrUpdateRefVendor
entry_form.description: The interface to add or update reference vendors

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!originalRefVendor: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ri!refVendor,
    refreshAlways: false(),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!isStateAndLocalGovt: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!isStateAndLocalGovt,
    replacementValue: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper()
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    skipAutoFocus: true(),
    label: if(
      ri!isAddAction,
      "Create Vendor",
      "Update Vendor"
    ),
    instructions: "Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*)",
    contents: {
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_refVendorBasicInformation(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        refVendor: ri!refVendor,
        originalRefVendor: local!originalRefVendor,
        isAddAction: ri!isAddAction,
        isStateAndLocalGovt: local!isStateAndLocalGovt
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_refVendorAddressInformation(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        refVendor: ri!refVendor
      )
    },
    buttons: rule!AS_CO_CPS_cancelSaveButtons(
      showWhen: true(),
      confirmSubmit: true(),
      cancelSubmit: true(),
      confirmLabel: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        bundleKey: if(
          ri!isAddAction,
          "btn_Create",
          "btn_Update"
        )
      ),
      cancelLabel: "Cancel",
      cancelAccessibilityText: "Press Enter to cancel",
      confirmAccessibilityText: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        bundleKey: if(
          ri!isAddAction,
          "acs_PressEnterToCreateNewVendor",
          "acs_PressEnterToUpdateVendor"
        )
      ),
      cancelSaveInto: {
        a!save(
          ri!userAction,
          cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
        )
      },
      confirmSaveInto: {
        a!save(
          ri!userAction,
          cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SUBMIT
        ),
        a!save(
          ri!refVendor,
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_CaptureMetadataForRefVendor(
            refVendor: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
              records: ri!refVendor,
              modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD(
                recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_GSS
              )
            ),
            initiator: loggedInUser()
          )
        )
      }
    )
  )
)

called_by: AS GSS Add or Update Reference Vendor

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CPS_cancelSaveButtons
sub_interfaces.description: Section with cancel and save buttons

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic radio button field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!displayValue: displayvalue(
    ri!value,
    ri!choiceValues,
    ri!choiceLabels,
    null
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(
        isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValue,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(
        isnull(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      choiceLayout: ri!choiceLayout,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
      choiceStyle: ri!choiceStyle
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: true
  ),
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!value,
    replacementValue: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(
        ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
      ),
      "-",
      ""
    )
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  readOnly: true,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(
      date: ri!value
    ),
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align,
    showHyphenIfValueNull :ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    value: ri!value,
    saveInto: ri!saveInto,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  )
)

if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount,
    inputPurpose: ri!inputPurpose
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QR_getReferenceVendors
expression_rules.description: Returns reference vendors synced record based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!vendorRefId
    ),
    if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(boolean: ri!fetchAll),
      {},
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
        operator: "=",
        value: true()
      )
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!vendorRefId
    ),
    if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(boolean: ri!fetchAll),
      {},
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
        operator: "=",
        value: true()
      )
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

data.sail_code:
cast(
  typeof(ri!array),
  reject(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(_),
    a!flatten(ri!array)
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
  typeof(ri!array),
  reject(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(_),
    a!flatten(ri!array)
  )
)

  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,

  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle
expression_rules.description: Retrieves and then displays a single label from a bundle file -- This is meant to be used in places where you cannot utilize local variables, such as record and site page names

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(

    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey
    ),

    local!i18nData: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
      bundleFolder: ri!bundleFolder,
      bundleNames: local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName,
      localeAgnostic: ri!localeAgnostic
    ),

    rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(
  
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    
    local!i18nData: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
      bundleFolder: ri!bundleFolder,
      bundleNames: local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName,
      localeAgnostic: ri!localeAgnostic
    ),
    
    rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead

data.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set.

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/
data.definition:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
expression_rules.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0
)

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_CaptureMetadataForRefVendor
expression_rules.description: The rule to capture metadata for reference vendor information

data.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!refVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName]
  ),
  {},
  a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!refVendor,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
        recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
        modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
        createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
        createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
        modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
        modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
        isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
        data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
          records: fv!item,
          modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD(
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
              nullableValue: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
              replacementValue: true()
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode: if(
              tointeger(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry]
              ) = cons!AS_GAM_REF_ID_COUNTRY_UNITED_STATES,
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
              null
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt: if(
              tointeger(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry]
              ) = cons!AS_GAM_REF_ID_COUNTRY_UNITED_STATES,
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
              null
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState: if(
              tointeger(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry]
              ) = cons!AS_GAM_REF_ID_COUNTRY_UNITED_STATES,
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState],
              null
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode: if(
              tointeger(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry]
              ) = cons!AS_GAM_REF_ID_COUNTRY_UNITED_STATES,
              null,
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode]
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes],
              expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
                data: fv!item,
                modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
                createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
                createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
                modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
                modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
                isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
                recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD
              )
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!refVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName]
  ),
  {},
  a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!refVendor,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
        recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
        modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
        createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
        createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
        modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
        modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
        isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
        data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
          records: fv!item,
          modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD(
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
              nullableValue: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
              replacementValue: true()
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode: if(
              tointeger(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry]
              ) = cons!AS_GAM_REF_ID_COUNTRY_UNITED_STATES,
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
              null
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt: if(
              tointeger(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry]
              ) = cons!AS_GAM_REF_ID_COUNTRY_UNITED_STATES,
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
              null
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState: if(
              tointeger(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry]
              ) = cons!AS_GAM_REF_ID_COUNTRY_UNITED_STATES,
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState],
              null
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode: if(
              tointeger(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry]
              ) = cons!AS_GAM_REF_ID_COUNTRY_UNITED_STATES,
              null,
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode]
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes],
              expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
                data: fv!item,
                modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
                createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
                createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
                modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
                modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
                isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
                recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD
              )
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_UT_validateAlphanumeric
expression_rules.description: Validates if the provided text is alphanumeric

expression_rules.description: Returns the standard labelPosition based on the context of the component, allows for custom input

expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is null/empty. Returns True or False.

expression_rules.description: The rule is used to validate FEIN and TIN values for ref vendor addition/update

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
expression_rules.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_VD_textValidation
expression_rules.description: Performs minimum and maximum length validation on a text value. Returns a validation message if any provided length constraints are violated. Allows for custom validation messages.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

constants.name: AS_GSS_ENUM_TEXT_LENGTH_FOR_US_ZIP_CODE
constants.description: Value: 5. Constant controlling the length of U.S. zip code fields

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Business Ref Type Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: if(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId] < 100000,
              text(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId],
                "#00000"
              ),
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId]
            ),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD,
              identifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Ref Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId], ""),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Type Code",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
        "",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
        "",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]),
        "",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "check",
              altText: "Yes",
              color: "#138901"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "times",
              altText: "No",
              color: "SECONDARY"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      align: "CENTER"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)

fields.display_name: Reconciliation And Migration Status For Federal
Reconciliation And Migration Status For SLG

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  emptyGridMessage: "No vendors available",
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_isActive(
        isActive: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      width: "ICON"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Name",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          rule!AS_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField(
            recordTitle: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
            recordIdentifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "UEI",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId,
      helpTooltip: "Unique Entity Identifier",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "DUNS",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns,
      helpTooltip:
      "Data Universal Numbering System",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "CAGE",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode,
      helpTooltip:
      "Commercial and Government Entity Code",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Status",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Business Type",
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_businessType(
        businessType: {},
        businessTypeRecord: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes]
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Address",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1]
          ),
          "-",
          rule!AS_GAM_UT_displayAddressAsEnvelope(
            addressLine1: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
            addressLine2: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
            state: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateName],
            city: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity],
            zipCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
            zipCodeExt: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
            foreignPostalCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
            country: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryName],
            countryId: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryId]
          )
        )
      ),
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Expiration Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    )
  },
  pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE,
  initialSorts: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
      ascending: true
    )
  },
  spacing: "STANDARD",
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)
